comments:
Create a JFrame with a JButton on the contentPane.  Copy the contentPane to the
clipboard and paste it onto itself (the contentPane is in FlowLayout).  All
works fine.  Then try to delete the newly pasted JPanel and NPE occurs as below.

Also if you do a reload following the copy another exception (probably related
in the reason) occurs in the proxy adapter
